title: One Dies: Colin Moriarty or Portillo the Wiener Dog - Gregway
description:
There can be only one! Which will it be...

Big thanks to Peter Petersen for the question.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/BUY T-SHIRTS: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Leave your questions for Greg as a video response and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Check out our Merch Store: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: hey bonejour it's a gregway you know the show every Wednesday and Friday I answer one of your questions comments or tweets and say just What's happen in the Greg spin of things right today's question comes from Peter Peterson was that his real name you be the judge Peter Peterson says Greg if you had to choose would you give away Colin or Portillo it's a up choice to ask me to make Peter Peterson like see I have I have followup I have questions on all of this right so what does that mean give away Colin or fillo in quotes like that are they being sentenced to death or are they just like going about their lives I just can't ever talk to them again like what what what what's the trait so like if I give away for tillo is someone there to take care of him or am I leaving him in the woods if I give away Colin does he have all his stuff and his job and his livelihood and everything else right like is if it's death then clearly I'm picking Colin he's a human being I love Pell we we've talked

give away Colin does he have all his stuff and his job and his livelihood and everything else right like is if it's death then clearly I'm picking Colin he's a human being I love Pell we we've talked about on the shows before here on game overg grey.com in a zombie apocalypse one of the first thing that happened pello has to die pello barks at every knock every noise he can't exist in that you know what I mean like i' I've already wrestled with the you know zombie apocalypse and now this up Sophie's Choice on how this would work I there there's different factors you weigh so if it's death I'm giving away Portillo I'm letting Colin live so he can continue to be crotchety and watch hockey um if if it's them leading their lives the rest of their lives as I I guess I still have to do that right like like yeah I probably still have to do that right cuz I love Colin I'm going to get more years out of Colin than patillo so if I was just giving like if it's like you can never talk to one of

like like yeah I probably still have to do that right cuz I love Colin I'm going to get more years out of Colin than patillo so if I was just giving like if it's like you can never talk to one of these things again or touch them or pet them I guess I got to pick con but that one's a bit I could see going either way right cuz like if I keep stick with me if I let if I give away Colin that way he just goes off and lives his life and he just has a happy life and moves back to New York eventually and yeah if I give away patillo again is he in the woods does he get to go to a nice family that's these are the concerns these are my concerns but there yeah I'd probably I guess both times I I I I have to keep calling I guess I guess yeah I mean there's a lot of factors here Peter Peterson you're not you're not weighing in on how Nick did I get him do you think that's the reasoning makes sense on what are some of the other what is there another situation where I'd have to give one of them away

you're not weighing in on how Nick did I get him do you think that's the reasoning makes sense on what are some of the other what is there another situation where I'd have to give one of them away that I I'm not comprehending no I think I nailed it Nick says I nailed it everybody that's how gregway works you leave your question or topic for conversation I have it with you because we're friends and I love you so godamn much until next way have a Greg way
